name: fastly-purge-all-task
description: Call the Fastly Purge API endpoint for a specific service. Selectively purge content with surrogate keys or purge an entire service
author: Trygghetsr√•det

inputs.name: fastlyapitoken
inputs.label: Fastly API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Your Fastly [API token](https://manage.fastly.com/account/personal/tokens). You should limit the scope of this token to a specific service and only give it access to perform purges.

inputs.name: fastlyserviceid
inputs.label: Fastly Service ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique ID of the [Fastly service](https://manage.fastly.com/services/all) you want to purge content from.
